text: The signal transduction events triggered by cross-linking of the <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> receptor have been widely studied in B cell lines , but little is known about signaling following <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> stimulation of monocytes and resting tonsillar B cells .
Therefore , we studied the <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> pathway in highly purified human monocytes and resting B cells .
After <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> triggering , a similar activation of the NF-kappaB ( but not of the AP-1 ) transcription factor complex occurred in both cell preparations .

However , the components of the NF-kappaB complexes were different in monocytes and B cells , because <extra_id_0> p50 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> is part of the NF-kappaB complex induced by <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> triggering in both monocytes and B cells , whereas <extra_id_0> p65 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> was only induced in B cells .

text: In contrast , although the <extra_id_0> Janus kinase 3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> tyrosine kinase was associated with <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> molecules in both monocytes and resting B cells , <extra_id_0> Janus kinase 3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> phosphorylation induction was observed only in <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - activated monocytes , with subsequent induction of <extra_id_0> STAT5a <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> DNA binding activity in the nucleus .

text: These results suggest that the activation signals in human B cells and monocytes differ following <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> stimulation .

This observation is consistent with the detection of normal <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - induced monocyte activation in patients with <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ligand+ hyper IgM syndrome in whom a defect in <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - induced B cell activation has been reported .
